parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause extended stopping distances, increased risk of accidents, and loss of vehicle control, which can lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: the brakes pulsate or make a grinding noise when applied
the vehicle takes longer to stop
the ABS control unit does not shut off
a noise continues from under the vehicle after shutting off the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake noise and vibration can be a sign of worn-out brake components, which can lead to reduced braking performance and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brakes pulsate or make a grinding noise when applied

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electric window cable can cause the window to malfunction, leading to inconvenience and potential safety issues, such as obstructed visibility or increased risk of theft.
symptoms: The electric window does not work
loose bolts on the guide track.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the emergency/parking brake pedal can cause the vehicle to roll back or move unintentionally, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The emergency/parking brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the pedal goes all the way to the floor
the vehicle rolls back or moves unintentionally when the emergency/parking brake is applied.
